dialogue: No, no, they’re old friends. But she doesn’t even really like him.
Oh, so there’s bad blood there?
What can we be doing here? Can you guys send out some kind of senior alert?
Does Thelma have any significant medical history we should be aware of?
She’s had breast cancer, a double mastectomy, colon cancer, sepsis, edema, valve replacement, hip replacement, arrhythmia, brain tumor--
We’ll give you guys a minute.
Allie was very good for you in that way. She was very organized, left brained. A grounding force.
